recipe.name: Tangy Carrot Casserole
recipe.notes: This is one of the few prepared cards in my Grandmother's collection, though no publisher is indicated.
recipe.preparation: Slice carrots diagonally.  Add basil and cook in salted water until tender.  Drain.Saute onion in butter.  Mix flour, salt, mustard, pepper and milk; add to onion and cook, stirring constantly, over medium heat until thick.Place a layer of carrots in a casserole.  Cover with grated cheese.  Alternate layers of carrots and cheese until ail used.  Pour sauce over top.  Sprinkle with croutons.  Bake at 350 degrees 15 minutes.
